name: Kappa London
slogan: Marrying digital engineering with head-turning designs
description: Our software's goal is to fuse AI with an elegant solution to revolutionise how the dental practice is managed across all the roles from the dentist to the hygienist and the manager.

team.title: UX Generalist
team.name: Markos Assias
team.bioHtml: UX generalist, specializing in information architecture and interaction design.

jobs.title: Back-end Engineer
jobs.description:
**We are looking for a back-end developer to join our young and motivated team.**

Join a team of developers, marketers, designers and intrapreneurs with years of experience in app building and web design. We're a fun bunch of tech dudes and gals making an awesome impression on the market. Things are going great so far so we want to bring in another engineer to our team.

**Hipsters, hustlers, hackers**

We started five years ago. We have strived and thrived and now our work looks and feels pretty impressive, so we are scaling up our business! To us, success depends on the number of people that love us.

**What makes us awesome?**

[Bryant Dental](https://bryant.dental/) - Making dentistry sexy

[Storyz.to](https://stories.zmooth.io/view/RYBMqRgebnqhJsvrQBEs) - Bringing real traffic on Instagram and turning presentations into stories

[Obby](https://obby.co.uk/) - Marketplace for hobbies 

[Zeelo](https://zeelo.co/) - Uber for coaches

**No rules, no papers. but loads of freedom. You are encouraged to be an explorer and bring your creative input to the table.**

You will be working alongside designers and other front-end engineers from the comfort of your home. You will participate in various projects and will craft head-turning layouts for websites and other digital experiences.

**The role requires following:**

- Good knowledge of English language, as we are an international team
- Supporting and troubleshooting existing client websites
- Preparing technical documentation and test plans
- Understanding the importance of maintainable code and coding standards
- Ability to be a team player and work independently too
- Willingness to learn and self-improve through feedback
- Strong ability to communicate via visual and verbal media
- Excellent time management skills
- Drive to produce excellent and creative work
- A can-do attitude towards work and a strong work ethic

If needed, our team can provide further training to extend your skills and the knowledge of mentioned technologies.

**What we're after:**

- Have a good understanding of HTML / CSS
- Know a bit of JavaScript (and jQuery)
- PHP - Must be very comfortable with it and have strong knowledge of this language
- Know at least one PHP MVC Framework
- Ideally, this framework is Laravel (a big plus, two pluses actually, we really need a Laravel guy) or Symfony (just a small plus)
- Other frameworks like CakePHP, Zend, CodeIgniter are ok (but we’ll need to train you in Laravel most likely)
- Have knowledge of SQL, specifically MySQL or PostgreSQL
- Have experience with Version Control (Git)
- Have some experience with Bash and Unix environments (generally we use Ubuntu 16.04 or later)
- Algorithmic experience is a plus as well

**Benefits**:

- Competitive monthly salary based on your qualification and experience
- Remote Working
- Excellent Learning Opportunities
- Killer Letter of Recommendation
- Blessings and Goodwill
- Resume Tailoring
- Further Career Guidance
- Super Informal Dress Code (you can wear your jammies all day for what we care)

We are looking for a back-end developer to join our young and motivated team.

Join a team of developers, marketers, designers and intrapreneurs with years of experience in app building and web design. We're a fun bunch of tech dudes and gals making an awesome impression on the market. Things are going great so far so we want to bring in another engineer to our team.

Hipsters, hustlers, hackers

We started five years ago. We have strived and thrived and now our work looks and feels pretty impressive, so we are scaling up our business! To us, success depends on the number of people that love us.

What makes us awesome?

Bryant Dental - Making dentistry sexy

Storyz.to - Bringing real traffic on Instagram and turning presentations into stories

Obby - Marketplace for hobbies

Zeelo - Uber for coaches

No rules, no papers. but loads of freedom. You are encouraged to be an explorer and bring your creative input to the table.

You will be working alongside designers and other front-end engineers from the comfort of your home. You will participate in various projects and will craft head-turning layouts for websites and other digital experiences.

The role requires following:

  • Good knowledge of English language, as we are an international team
  • Supporting and troubleshooting existing client websites
  • Preparing technical documentation and test plans
  • Understanding the importance of maintainable code and coding standards
  • Ability to be a team player and work independently too
  • Willingness to learn and self-improve through feedback
  • Strong ability to communicate via visual and verbal media
  • Excellent time management skills
  • Drive to produce excellent and creative work
  • A can-do attitude towards work and a strong work ethic

If needed, our team can provide further training to extend your skills and the knowledge of mentioned technologies.

What we're after:

  • Have a good understanding of HTML / CSS
  • Know a bit of JavaScript (and jQuery)
  • PHP - Must be very comfortable with it and have strong knowledge of this language
  • Know at least one PHP MVC Framework
  • Ideally, this framework is Laravel (a big plus, two pluses actually, we really need a Laravel guy) or Symfony (just a small plus)
  • Other frameworks like CakePHP, Zend, CodeIgniter are ok (but we’ll need to train you in Laravel most likely)
  • Have knowledge of SQL, specifically MySQL or PostgreSQL

  • Have some experience with Bash and Unix environments (generally we use Ubuntu 16.04 or later)
  • Algorithmic experience is a plus as well

Benefits:

  • Competitive monthly salary based on your qualification and experience

  • Killer Letter of Recommendation
  • Blessings and Goodwill
  • Resume Tailoring
  • Further Career Guidance
  • Super Informal Dress Code (you can wear your jammies all day for what we care)
